query:
SELECT 
  p.productId,
  p.name,
  p.phaseType,
  JSON_EXTRACT(p.specifications, '$.Chemistry') as chemistry,
  JSON_EXTRACT(p.specifications, '$.Phase') as phase,
  JSON_EXTRACT(p.specifications, '$.["Separation Mode"]') as sep_mode,
  c.name as category_name
FROM products p
JOIN product_categories pc ON p.id = pc.productId
JOIN categories c ON pc.categoryId = c.id
WHERE p.brand = 'Waters'
LIMIT 10;

  JSON_EXTRACT(p.specifications, '$.Phase') as phase,
  JSON_EXTRACT(p.specifications, '$.["Separation Mode"]') as sep_mode,
  c.name as category_name
FROM products p
JOIN product_categories pc ON p.id = pc.productId
JOIN categories c ON pc.categoryId = c.id
WHERE p.brand = 'Waters'
LIMIT 10;
